The claim was published in an image on F: stating that Android users are automatically signed up to the COVIDSafe app via Google’s new Exposure Notifications API.
The image provides instructions for Andr: 19 Exposure Notifications feature is enabled on their phones and how to turn it off.
The expert: Vanessa Teague, CEO of Thinking Cybersecurity and an associate professor at the Australian National University, explains the difference between a contact tracing app and the Exposure Notification API, stating that the API is not an app and functions differently.
